PSNC rates rising, with state approval



Jun. 28--State regulators Wednesday approved an 11 percent rate increase for PSNC Energy, the natural gas utility that has 446,000 customers in North Carolina. Utilities Commission said that PSNC could raise residential rates from $1.18 per therm -- a unit of heat measure ...
